statements: DELETE FROM feedback_and_testimonials WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM feedback_and_testimonials WHERE feedback_id = 101 AND patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM feedback_and_testimonials WHERE feedback_id = 202 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM testimonials WHERE patient_id = 202 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM testimonials WHERE patient_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM feedback WHERE therapy_outcome = 'Positive' AND patient_id = 201;
DELETE FROM therapists WHERE therapist_name = 'John Doe';
